net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Class JDBCSQLTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.AbstractTableModel
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.SQLTableModel
        • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.JDBCSQLTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, TableModel

    public class JDBCSQLTableModel
extends SQLTableModel
implements Cloneable
    SQLTableModel subclass using a JDBC Connection. The Connection passed in is not closed.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBCSQLTableModel

        public JDBCSQLTableModel(DataSource dataSource,
                 String query)
                  throws SQLException
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The data source.
        query - The query string, must be able to have "ORDER BY field1, field2, .. LIMIT x,y" clause appended.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database error occurs creating the statement.

      • JDBCSQLTableModel

        public JDBCSQLTableModel(DataSource dataSource,
                 String query,
                 List columns,
                 int defaultSortedColumn)
                  throws SQLException
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The data source.
        query - The query string, must be able to have "ORDER BY field1, field2, .. LIMIT x,y" clause appended.
        columns - List of SQLTableModelColumn objects to display in the table, null will create a list from the query result.
        defaultSortedColumn - The index in the columns parameter of the default sorted column. The sort order is ASCENDING.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database error occurs creating the statement.

      • JDBCSQLTableModel

        public JDBCSQLTableModel(DataSource dataSource,
                 String query,
                 List columns,
                 int defaultSortedColumn,
                 SortOrder order)
                  throws SQLException
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The data source.
        query - The query string, must be able to have "ORDER BY field1, field2, .. LIMIT x,y" clause appended.
        columns - List of SQLTableModelColumn objects to display in the table, null will create a list from the query result.
        defaultSortedColumn - The index in the columns parameter of the default sorted column.
        order - The sort order of the default sorted column.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database error occurs creating the statement.
